info.title: AI Generation Feedback API
info.description: API for managing feedback on AI-generated content

tags.name: AI Generation Feedback
tags.description: Operations related to AI generation feedback management

Bearer.description: Authentication method using a Bearer token. Include the token in the Authorization header. Example: 'Authorization: Bearer {app_token}'

value.description: The feedback value - stored as string regardless of feedback type. **Validation depends on `type` field:** When type is `int`, value must be a valid integer (e.g., '5', '-10'). When type is `decimal`, value must be a valid decimal number with decimal point (e.g., '4.5', '-3.14'). When type is `boolean`, value must be 'true' or 'false' (case-insensitive). When type is `text`, value must be a non-empty string (max 2000 characters).

entity_type.description: The type of entity this feedback is related to

entity_uid.description: The unique identifier of the related entity

name.description: The specific name/identifier for the feedback type

post.description: Submit feedback for AI-generated content. **Available for Staff tokens**

400.description: Bad Request - Invalid request parameters or duplicate feedback

401.description: Unauthorized - Invalid or missing authentication token

429.description: Too Many Requests - Rate limit exceeded
